required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Estimation of Off-Label Use of XGEVA® (Denosumab) Using Population-Based Databases in Denmark
clinical_study.official_title: Estimation of Off-Label Use of XGEVA® (Denosumab) Using Population-Based Databases in Denmark

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims to evaluate off-label XGEVA use in Denmark using data linked from registries and other sources in Northern Jutland Region and Copenhagen. This will allow for accurate assessment of prescriptions and diagnoses, especially those related to cancer patients during the first year post the initial market availability of XGEVA.

primary_outcome.measure: on or off label individual prescription type
primary_outcome.description: Yes/no regarding whether an individual prescription was on (or off) label

primary_outcome.measure: on or off label patient treatment
primary_outcome.description: Yes/no regarding whether the patient was treated on (or off) label

secondary_outcome.description: XGEVA prescription for each type of off-label use

secondary_outcome.measure: off-label use stratified by administering department
secondary_outcome.description: Prescriptions that are for off-label use stratified by department that administers treatment

intervention.intervention_name: Database assessment of off-label XGEVA use
intervention.description: No intervention is planned during this study as it involves analyses of patient electronic records from Northern Jutland Region and Copenhagen

study_pop.textblock: The study population will include 108-200 patients who receive a prescription in secondary care of XGEVA during the first year after the initial market availability. These patients will be identified from the Danish National Registry of Patients and other sources in the Northern Jutland Region and Copenhagen.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
The study will include patients with a prescription for XGEVA® given in secondary care with a minimum of 108 XGEVA users, in the Northern Jutland Region and Copenhagen during the first 1-year post XGEVA market availability, defined as 12 months after RADS opinion on 24th January 2013 or after the minimum sample has been achieved.
Exclusion Criteria:
